question: Please can you tell me if i can get married when i am on my period (menses), as i think that i will be and my wedding has been aranged for some time
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Marriage during menses is valid. It is permissible to suppress the menses by
taking medication due to circumstances, e.g. marriage.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
